•4th of July themed power balls that sparkle and explode
•Take Surveys to easily win thousands of tickets to buy special power ball bundles
•Minor bug fixes and improved experience, leveling up and unlocking new boards has never been easier

Skee-Ball Plus 2.0 is here!

Transition to full free download game.

Introduced new features:
- Weekly challenge - win weekly reward if you win at least 3 daily challenges through the current week
- Collector's Edition - you can now purchase and unlock all cabinets and game modes, it can be purchased as permanent feature
- Trophy Power Balls can be now purchased as permanent features directly from trophies screen or via shop screen
- Ticket Power Teller - it multiplies your ticket payout x3, it can be purchased as permanent feature - GREAT VALUE!
